references.paper_title: A thin-plate spline and the decomposition of deformations
references.reason: This paper introduces thin-plate splines, which are commonly used for warping clothing images onto target persons in virtual try-on methods, impacting garment geometry adaptation.

references.paper_title: Viton-hd: High-resolution virtual try-on via misalignment-aware normalization
references.reason: This paper presents VITON-HD, a virtual try-on method that attempts to achieve high-resolution results, and it has served as a direct comparison in this paper's experiments.
This paper establishes the core methodology for diffusion models, which are used as the base for the video try-on methods considered by this paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is the basis for the Stable Diffusion model, which is used as a foundation by the proposed method's network architecture.

references.paper_title: Smpl: A skinned multi-person linear model
references.reason: This paper introduces the SMPL model, which this work leverages in building its 3D textured guidance.
